description: Dataset name.
Sample identifier.
Categorical variable describing sample - highest order.
Categorical variable describing sample - high order.
Categorical variable describing sample - low order.
Categorical variable describing sample - lowest order.
Commercial name of the sample - if available on the market.
Country of acquisition using ISO3 code from http://www.fao.org/countryprofiles/iso3list/en/.
Database code describing the biological sample.
Database code describing the sequencing run.
Database code describing the experiment.
Database code describing the study.
Database code describing the project.
Database origin of the raw data.
Whether to expect SINGLE or PAIRED end reads.
Sequencing platform - could be modified as new sequencing platforms are added to the database.
DNA extraction kit.
Date of sample collection (YYYY-MM-DD).
Total number of bases sequenced in the sample - calculated from raw data.
Number of final reads - calculated from raw data.
Minimum read length - calculated from raw data.
Median read length - calculated from raw data.
Mean read length - calculated from raw data.
Maximum read length - calculated from raw data.
Curator name.
